growth_pattern.title: Growth Deceleration Despite Mobile Money Boom
findings: Account ownership grew only +3pp (46% to 49%) from 2021-2024
Contrasts with 65M+ mobile money accounts registered
Suggests high account duplication and inactivity rates
growth_pattern.implication: Focus needed on active usage, not just registration

gender_dynamics.title: Persistent Gender Gap
findings: Mobile money helped but structural barriers remain
Targeted interventions needed for female inclusion

usage_paradox.title: The Digital Payment Paradox
findings: Suggests informal usage without formal accounts
usage_paradox.implication: Usage broader than formal account ownership

infrastructure_correlation.title: Infrastructure as Critical Enabler
infrastructure_correlation.implication: Infrastructure investments yield delayed but significant returns

market_evolution.title: Competition Driving Market Evolution
market_evolution.implication: Market structure changes correlate with adoption patterns

limitations: Some indicators not comparable over time
Hard to measure precise event impacts
